original_title: Sri Lanka bonds opens steady, rupee 327.50/329.00 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds opened steady, dealers said while the spot US dollar opened at 326.75/328.00 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was quoted steady at 15.40/50 after closing 15.90/16.00 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2028 was quoted unchanged at 15.10/15.15 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted steady 13.40/50 after closing at 13.40/45 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted steady at 14.50/75 after closing at 14.40/70 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted steady at 15.00/25 after closing at 15.10/25 percent.  (Colombo/July19/2023)
